pr_title: Add a length limit of 512 to the properties stored in the segment metadata

Add a length limit of 512 to the properties stored in the segment metadata

timeline.author: yupeng9

replies.bodyText: They are independent, where the maxLength is configurable in the FieldSpec to allow ingesting long strings, but the property length limit is fixed. Also, the property length limit also applies to the BYTES column.
replies.author: Jackie-Jiang
